alert.note: Alert for Morris; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 4:05AM EST until further notice by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Passaic River At Chatham affecting Morris and Somerset Counties. For the Passaic River...including Chatham...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Passaic River at Chatham. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, Open areas adjacent to the Passaic River flood in New Providence, Chatham Township, and Berkley Heights. At 6.0 feet, Portions of the Shepard Kolluck Park in Chatham floods. River Road by Henry Drive is subject to closures. At 6.5 feet, The Central and Bridge Avenue bridges in Chatham Township are subject to closures. Edgewood Road is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 6.2 feet this morning. It will then fall to 6.0 feet and begin rising again this afternoon. It will rise to 6.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.3 feet on 03/30/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (7 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Stg Time Date Passaic River Chatham 6.0 6.0 Thu 3 am 6.2 6.2 6.2 7am 12/28 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 415 PM EST.
